domain.interactions.commands

Class Help

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.interactions.Command
      • domain.interactions.commands.Help

  • public class Help
extends Command
    This command is responsible for helping the player with information. The 'help' command can be called by itself or accompanied by a parameter. Say, if the player needed help with a specific command, it could be achieved with: 'help show'. This will call the helpInfo from the Show command.

      Help()

      The info to display when used as a parameter to the 'help' command.
      void run()
      Calls the 'parameters' helpInfo() method.
      void showAvailableParameters()
      This showAvailableParameters() method is special, because it will only show if the Help Command is called by itself.

    • Method Detail

      • checkAvailableParameters

        public void checkAvailableParameters()
        All available parameters are set to all the primary parameters.
        Specified by:
        checkAvailableParameters in class Command

      • run

        public void run()
        Calls the 'parameters' helpInfo() method. Say, if the player entered 'help go', the Go.helpInfo() method would be called. (A method that the implementation overrides).
        Specified by:
        run in class Command
        See Also:
        Command.validateCommand(String), Command.checkAvailableParameters()

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Specified by:

      • helpInfo

        public void helpInfo()
        Description copied from class: Command
        The info to display when used as a parameter to the 'help' command.
        Specified by:
        helpInfo in class Command

      • showAvailableParameters

        public void showAvailableParameters()
        This showAvailableParameters() method is special, because it will only show if the Help Command is called by itself. If that happens, the Help command will print out specific guidance to that room. (Directions, interactions and available commands)
        Overrides:
        showAvailableParameters in class Command
